channel.title: OS PvP || Instant PK, Professional, Community driven, Advanced PvP
channel.description:
[URL=http://os-pvp.net][FONT=Palatino Linotype][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7OdVN7E.gif[/img][/URL] [IMG]https://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/large-home-icons/16/Small_house_home_arrow_building.png[/img] [URL=http://os-pvp.net/][SIZE=4][B]Home[/B][/SIZE][/URL] || [IMG]http://i4.minus.com/iSGwRmvs7QfGp.png[/img] [URL=http://os-pvp.net/index.php?action=forum][B][SIZE=4]Forums[/SIZE][/B][/URL] || [IMG]http://cdn2.iconfinder.com/data/icons/splashyIcons/download.png[/img] [URL=http://os-pvp.net/client/OSPvP.jar][B][SIZE=4]Download[/SIZE][/B][/URL] || [IMG]http://www.tradearcadepro.com/images/CheckIconSmall.png[/img] [URL=http://os-pvp.net/index.php?page=vote][B][SIZE=4]Vote[/SIZE][/B][/URL][/FONT]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/an3UtFk.png[/img]
[SIZE=2][B]OS PvP is a professional PvP-focused server that aims to entertain, striving for nothing but perfection and endless fun. We have no other goal than to become one of the greatest PK servers out there. Pushing out regular updates and fixes, we will in time become one of the most advanced PvP systems there are. We are community driven and the server aswell as the website has a professional layout for easy use. So what are you waiting for? Join OS PvP now![/B][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NDsQubL.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=2]We aim to not only offer you many features, but perfected features. Below is a list of notable features on OS PvP:[/B]
[ul][*]Easy-to-use website and forums [*]Easy-access commands for fast PKing [*]Professional, fast loading client [*]Restricted spawning [*]Flawless 474 data [*]New f-hotkeys & smooth switching [*]Perfect orb-drainage with flickering [*]Automated donation & vote systems [*]Several bosses to defeat as a secondary way to get gear [*]Full clan chat w/ kicking, banning, ranksand saving [*]Advanced PvP system w/ killstreaks, PvP tasks & rewards [*]Full Duel Arena w/automatic whip/dds rule [*]Full Pest Control with perfect timers and rewards [*]Full right-click autocasting [*]Flawless special attacks and timers [*]Flawless combat following [*]And much, much more...[/ul] [/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/B0DFVd9.png[/img]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IEs9pw0F3UM]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IEs9pw0F3UM[/url]
[B][SIZE=2]Client Layout[/B] Our client loads very fast and has an amazing look. We just wanted to take a moment to show the layout of the login screen off. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Zus2Ar7.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=2]Active PKing[/B] We offer you active PKing around the clock. Note that this is after only a few days of uptime. We have no intent of stopping here. Here's a preview of our playerbase, and our wilderness activtiy: [IMG]http://os-pvp.net/images/screenshot9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/huYQavp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6rwM25w.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cfqo4d8.png[/img][/SIZE]
[B]Full Clan Chats w/ kicking, banning, ranks & saving[/B] Maybe not the most unique future now-a-days, but we do have it. Our clan chats are flawless and will help you create clans for PKing or just hanging out, as everything is saved upon logout. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MUlbXNO.png[/img]
[B]Duel Arena[/B] Needless to say, the Duel Arena is a perfect addition to any server for anyone who likes to gamble. We have it on our server, fully working. Don't lose your bank, though! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IwhDqCf.png[/img]
[B][URL=http://os-pvp.net/]We do offer a lot more than these pictures reveal, so join us now and start your adventure today![/URL][/B][/SIZE]

item.title: OS PvP || Instant PK, Professional, Community driven, Advanced PvP
item.dc:creator: @k3wl_0wnz_y0 k3wl 0wnz y0
item.description:
@k3wl_0wnz_y0 wrote:

Just updated with a new minigame and some more goodies, come check us out! Lots of PKers around the clock

Just pushed out some updates including a launcher to automatically check for client updates, gameframe toggling and some combat fixes along with other goodies.

Read full topic

item.title: OS PvP || Instant PK, Professional, Community driven, Advanced PvP
item.dc:creator: @k3wl_0wnz_y0 k3wl 0wnz y0
item.description:
@k3wl_0wnz_y0 wrote:

[URL=http://os-pvp.net][FONT=Palatino Linotype][/URL]
[URL=http://os-pvp.net/][SIZE=4][B]Home[/B][/SIZE][/URL] || [URL=http://os-pvp.net/index.php?action=forum][B][SIZE=4]Forums[/SIZE][/B][/URL] || [URL=http://os-pvp.net/client/OSPvP.jar][B][SIZE=4]Download[/SIZE][/B][/URL] || [URL=http://os-pvp.net/index.php?page=vote][B][SIZE=4]Vote[/SIZE][/B][/URL][/FONT]

[SIZE=2][B]OS PvP is a professional PvP-focused server that aims to entertain, striving for nothing but perfection and endless fun.
We have no other goal than to become one of the greatest PK servers out there. Pushing out regular updates and fixes, we will in
time become one of the most advanced PvP systems there are. We are community driven and the server aswell as the website has
a professional layout for easy use. So what are you waiting for? Join OS PvP now![/B][/SIZE]

[B][SIZE=2]We aim to not only offer you many features, but perfected features. Below is a list of notable features on OS PvP:[/B]

[ul][]Easy-to-use website and forums
[]Easy-access commands for fast PKing
[]Professional, fast loading client
[]Restricted spawning
[]Flawless 474 data
[]New f-hotkeys & smooth switching
[]Perfect orb-drainage with flickering
[]Automated donation & vote systems
[]Several bosses to defeat as a secondary way to get gear
[]Full clan chat w/ kicking, banning, ranksand saving
[]Advanced PvP system w/ killstreaks, PvP tasks & rewards
[]Full Duel Arena w/automatic whip/dds rule
[]Full Pest Control with perfect timers and rewards
[]Full right-click autocasting
[]Flawless special attacks and timers
[]Flawless combat following
[*]And much, much more…[/ul]
[/SIZE]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IEs9pw0F3UM

[B][SIZE=2]Client Layout[/B]
Our client loads very fast and has an amazing look. We just wanted to take a moment to show
the layout of the login screen off.

[B][SIZE=2]Active PKing[/B]
We offer you active PKing around the clock. Note that this is after only a few days of uptime.
We have no intent of stopping here. Here’s a preview of our playerbase, and our wilderness activtiy:

[/SIZE]

[B]Full Clan Chats w/ kicking, banning, ranks & saving[/B]
Maybe not the most unique future now-a-days, but we do have it. Our clan chats are flawless and
will help you create clans for PKing or just hanging out, as everything is saved upon logout.

[B]Duel Arena[/B]
Needless to say, the Duel Arena is a perfect addition to any server for anyone who
likes to gamble. We have it on our server, fully working. Don’t lose your bank, though!

[B][URL=http://os-pvp.net/]We do offer a lot more than these pictures reveal, so join us now and start your adventure today![/URL][/B][/SIZE]

Read full topic
item.source: OS PvP || Instant PK, Professional, Community driven, Advanced PvP
